topic.title: Updated gentoo section
topic.body:
1. Not all installations have layman, and it's being phased out.
2. Need to `emerge --sync` after adding a new repository.
3. Added a line that adds the zeronet service to the default autostart runlevel (under optional)

topic.title: Fixed a line in the gentoo instructions.
topic.body: That keyword only works for one specific iteration of the package. It is wrong for the current version, and this is a more appropriate command.
